synopsis.text:
Kawasaki, Honda, and Suzuki form the formidable ninth unit of the Sushi Police, a task force committed to preserving the authenticity of Japanese cuisine, particularly sushi, across the globe. As the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games spark a worldwide sushi craze, the Sushi Police, backed by the prestigious World Food-Culture Conservation Organization (WFCO), are relentless in their pursuit of restaurants serving non-traditional sushi, no matter how minor the offense.

However, their unwavering dedication and aggressive tactics soon fuel global resentment, as restaurant owners worldwide bear the brunt of their wrath. Amidst their crusade, the Sushi Police cross paths with Sara, a cunning and charismatic television reporter determined to expose the corruption within the WFCO. As Sara skillfully evades their clutches, the true intentions of the Sushi Police are set to unravel, leaving them to question their roles as protectors or enforcers of Japan's culinary heritage.
